channel.title: Update on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Update on Home

item.title: Update 9.4
item.description: Statistics of battles fought during update 9.4. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not career stats unless otherwise mentioned. In total, there were 127M battles by 454k players recorded.
